snippet.title: Alt-Play: Jason Rohrer Anthology - DSiWare Trailer
snippet.description:
Three indie games in one? Sounds good to me! Jason Rohrer Anthology's simplicity may seem a tad off-putting to some, but I'm willing to bet this collection has some fun elements to it. Coming soon to DSiWare! Planning on giving this a shot? 
++++++++++++++++++ 
Even more Nintendo goodness at http://www.wiiloveit.com
